channel.title: miljko tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from miljko.

item.description: Odlično pitanje, još bolji odgovor! "Ne treba da mislimo da je [Zapadni] način finansiranja potreban da bi naši univerziteti bili dobro rangirani — taj cilj ćemo bolje postići ulaganjem u konkretne talentovane pojedince…a ne teranjem [naučnika] da gube vreme boreći se za novac." https://t.co/iT7SofviZp
item.source:markdown: Odlično pitanje, još bolji odgovor! "Ne treba da mislimo da je [Zapadni] način finansiranja potreban da bi naši univerziteti bili dobro rangirani — taj cilj ćemo bolje postići ulaganjem u konkretne talentovane pojedince…a ne teranjem [naučnika] da gube vreme boreći se za novac." https://t.co/iT7SofviZp

item.description:
@nntaleb "Psychologists pro-science" chef's kiss

Janan Ganesh is the rare newspaper columnist who is able to think clearly and string coherent arguments across articles. Most can't manage consistency between two paragraphs.
item.source:markdown:
@nntaleb "Psychologists pro-science" *chef's kiss*
Janan Ganesh is the rare newspaper columnist who is able to think clearly and string coherent arguments across articles. Most can't manage consistency between two paragraphs.

item.description: @NoemiTitarenco @fortelabs Apple Notes has improved by orders of magnitude in the last 2-3 years. The only thing against it is that Apple hasn’t cared much for backward compatibility and exporting, and they’ve abandoned even more popular software in the past. Are you worried about lock-in?
item.source:markdown: @NoemiTitarenco @fortelabs Apple Notes has improved by orders of magnitude in the last 2-3 years. The only thing against it is that Apple hasn’t cared much for backward compatibility and exporting, and they’ve abandoned even more popular software in the past. Are you worried about lock-in?

item.description: @pauld198 @mikeharrisNY Wish it were only lit majors… Science and med twitter are full of threads on how to make everything into a story. Grant workshops that teach you how to package your proposal into a streamlined easily digestible narrative aren't helping.
item.source:markdown: @pauld198 @mikeharrisNY Wish it were only lit majors… Science and med twitter are full of threads on how to make everything into a story. Grant workshops that teach you how to package your proposal into a streamlined easily digestible narrative aren't helping.

item.description: @timtriche The trouble is that it works so well in so many domains that you can be fooled into thinking it is universal. That's why it should be a full year course. (btw for amateurs playing with fun bits of math that don't do well with arithmetic, Mathemathica is excellent </psa>)
item.source:markdown: @timtriche The trouble is that it works so well in so many domains that you can be fooled into thinking it is universal. That's why it should be a full year course. (btw for amateurs playing with fun bits of math that don't do well with arithmetic, Mathemathica is excellent </psa>)

item.description: @timtriche Yes! There should be a full semester-long course in probability. Brushing over dice rolls and the Gaussian distribution in a week or two does more harm than good.
item.source:markdown: @timtriche Yes! There should be a full semester-long course in probability. Brushing over dice rolls and the Gaussian distribution in a week or two does more harm than good.

item.description:
“If you go to the casino you got to play for years before you win eight times in a row. But if you have 8 billion people play in the casino, that will happen every day. This is how we can trade time for sample size”.

As simple as you can make it. Still won’t change people’s mind https://t.co/9H2KRS7lDo
item.source:markdown:
“If you go to the casino you got to play for years before you win eight times in a row. But if you have 8 billion people play in the casino, that will happen every day. This is how we can trade time for sample size”.
As simple as you can make it. Still won’t change people’s mind https://t.co/9H2KRS7lDo

item.description:
As good of a day as any to note that using sarcasm is intellectually lazy anywhere, but both lazy and dangerous on Twitter. @boztank says it well https://t.co/m1XmzO968u

My own contribution from last year is… less cogent https://t.co/GrN0eZIf9h
item.source:markdown:
As good of a day as any to note that using sarcasm is intellectually lazy anywhere, but both lazy and dangerous on Twitter. @boztank says it well https://t.co/m1XmzO968u

item.description:
“Još jedan Nefliksov pokušaj da nešto uradi a da ne uradi u suštini ništa.” A+ zapažanje primenjivo na 99% Nefliksovog opusa. https://t.co/YaiBzd73ER

Inače, odlična epizoda, samo što nije podcast. Ne znam šta je (web-radio emisija?), ali bez RSS-a nije podcast. @HeartefactMedia, @keller_leya, bilo ko… molim vas, uključite RSS feed u SoundCloud-u.
item.source:markdown:
“Još jedan Nefliksov pokušaj da nešto uradi a da ne uradi u suštini ništa.” A+ zapažanje primenjivo na 99% Nefliksovog opusa. https://t.co/YaiBzd73ER

item.description: @DrChrisHourigan Not an expert either. The last time I checked (board prep 5+ years ago) it was mainly for children. Assuming some evidence for adults has been generated since…? If any of your followers know, would be nice to learn.
item.source:markdown: @DrChrisHourigan Not an expert either. The last time I checked (board prep 5+ years ago) it was mainly for children. Assuming some evidence for adults has been generated since…? If any of your followers know, would be nice to learn.

item.description: @DrChrisHourigan Great sentence. But: "Half a century later, [proton beam] therapy has now become standard around the globe…" Is this true? Have protons replaced photons in IMRT?
item.source:markdown: @DrChrisHourigan Great sentence. But: "Half a century later, [proton beam] therapy has now become standard around the globe…" Is this true? Have protons replaced photons in IMRT?

item.description: A true T-cell lymphoma hero (who smartly doesn't have a Twitter account) #lymsm https://t.co/ewgx6tT7j9
item.source:markdown: A true T-cell lymphoma hero (who smartly doesn't have a Twitter account) #lymsm https://t.co/ewgx6tT7j9

item.description: @nntaleb It takes a special kind of idiot to intentionally misinterpret an add for the German version of VAERS as groundbreaking news. The upside is that it is yet another litmus test for reading comprehension and general intelligence (much better than IQ!)
item.source:markdown: @nntaleb It takes a special kind of idiot to intentionally misinterpret an add for the German version of VAERS as groundbreaking news. The upside is that it is yet another litmus test for reading comprehension and general intelligence (much better than IQ!)

item.description: Please, please, please do not cite narrative reviews for your (potentially contentious) claims, even if you are a public health agency. Especially if you are a public health agency. https://t.co/VFTUlDLeOK https://t.co/XyPT6vSMmg
item.source:markdown: Please, please, please do not cite narrative reviews for your (potentially contentious) claims, even if you are a public health agency. *Especially* if you are a public health agency. https://t.co/VFTUlDLeOK https://t.co/XyPT6vSMmg

item.description: Nassim Taleb is a tough act to follow, but this 90-minute primer on covid was A+. A tiny quibble (I have to, I’m sorry): A.F. discouraging mask use was more a misguided attempt to manage the shortage than an evidence-based rec. Backfired, obviously. https://t.co/AkQexrNwfl
item.source:markdown: Nassim Taleb is a tough act to follow, but this 90-minute primer on covid was A+. A tiny quibble (I have to, I’m sorry): A.F. discouraging mask use was more a misguided attempt to manage the shortage than an evidence-based rec. Backfired, obviously. https://t.co/AkQexrNwfl

item.description: @MihailoCvijetic @prikljucenija1 @SkorupanMD Heh, da, ni meni! To je knjiga za pročitati u ranim dvadesetim, kada imaš dovoljno vremena, mentalnog kapaciteta, i motivacije da čitaš dalje nakon G.E.B. Ja sam uhvatio poslednji voz (a možda sam i zakasnio, videćemo).
item.source:markdown: @MihailoCvijetic @prikljucenija1 @SkorupanMD Heh, da, ni meni! To je knjiga za pročitati u ranim dvadesetim, kada imaš dovoljno vremena, mentalnog kapaciteta, i motivacije da čitaš dalje nakon G.E.B. Ja sam uhvatio poslednji voz (a možda sam i zakasnio, videćemo).

item.description: @Pandurevich They were probably too embarrassed to show it. One of the few things I absolutely demand as a peer reviewer is a plot for every correlation, at least in the supplement.
item.source:markdown: @Pandurevich They were probably too embarrassed to show it. One of the few things I absolutely demand as a peer reviewer is a plot for every correlation, at least in the supplement.

item.description: Survey, you say? I have a better one for you https://t.co/uWOZsi7Yh4 https://t.co/JIXrt3jaLW https://t.co/l46VuXNeMt

item.description: “What blew my mind was that the amyloidophile reviewers were actually angry at applicants who did not adhere to the amyloid hypothesis, and were determined to make sure that these applicants did not receive funding.” Dr. Neve on Alzheimer’s research. Yikes https://t.co/Oi2t6OhCap
item.source:markdown: “What blew my mind was that the amyloidophile reviewers were actually angry at applicants who did not adhere to the amyloid hypothesis, and were determined to make sure that these applicants did not receive funding.” Dr. Neve on Alzheimer’s research. Yikes https://t.co/Oi2t6OhCap

item.description: This 90-minute conversation between @trishankkarthik and @stephen_wolfram goes great with a Sunday espresso. Familiarity with Wolfram's prior work preferred but not required, thanks to the work Trishank's put in preparing. https://t.co/FVKULM6I7t
item.source:markdown: This 90-minute conversation between @trishankkarthik and @stephen_wolfram goes great with a Sunday espresso. Familiarity with Wolfram's prior work preferred but not required, thanks to the work Trishank's put in preparing. https://t.co/FVKULM6I7t

item.description: "Watching the pandemic unfold, and watching what people have said and not said about it, I have to say I'm pretty unimpressed [with IQ]. If people who were filtered down to do that stuff were filtered by an IQ filter, it did a really bad job." -S. Wolfram https://t.co/l7u8zamzRe
item.source:markdown: "Watching the pandemic unfold, and watching what people have said and not said about it, I have to say I'm pretty unimpressed [with IQ]. If people who were filtered down to do that stuff were filtered by an IQ filter, it did a really bad job." -S. Wolfram https://t.co/l7u8zamzRe
